system.useTime:
The Fruits of Corrupted Blood: Start with one additional Navigator Power, choose any three Navigator Powers (even those not currently possessed), gain +10 to all these tests in addition to other bonuses.
Unchecked Mutation: Tests to avoid gaining mutation are +0 instead of +10, begin game with 1d5 Insanity Points.
Renegades: Start with 1d5 Corruption Points, all tests to interact with official bodies of the Imperium have -10. Many who know of the characters house may be suspicious of them.
Initial Mutation: Start with two Navigator Mutations, rolled randomly. Additional mutations may be gained when new Powers or Mastery is gained.
